title: Ep 112: It Can't Be Too Bedazzled
itunes:title: Ep 112: It Can't Be Too Bedazzled
itunes:subtitle: Hair guru Adir Abergel explains how to wear hair accessories (and not look ridiculous), reveals the cut of the moment, and inspires us to wear more jewelry. Before that: We chat about Sephora's big new beauty event, Crayola's cool Asos collab...
description:
Hair guru Adir Abergel explains how to wear hair accessories (and not look ridiculous), reveals the cut of the moment, and inspires us to wear more jewelry. Before that: We chat about Sephora's big new beauty event, Crayola's cool Asos collab, and our cool new crimping hack.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
